Doña Rosa además de cuidar su hogar se dedica a las tareas del campo las mismas que le permiten mejorar la economía de su hogar, ella siembra hortalizas y las vende en su comunidad, cría animales como: cerdos, cuyes, gallinas y ganado, la tarea más importante es de aun conservar las tradiciones de sus padres y se dedica a fabricar sombreros de paja toquilla.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de alimento para sus animales y también va a comprar paja toquilla para realisar sus sombreros.
texts.en:
Rosa’s a member of the “Las Toquilleras” (The Straw Hat Makers) communal bank.  All its members live near Sigsig Canton, a place surrounded by beautiful mountains.  Most of the women in this canon are housewives who do their household chores and also work in agriculture, raise animals or make straw hats.  Many work in the city and preserve the culture and traditions of their peoples.

Rosa, 46, is married and has had six children.  Two of them are married and live independently, one attends university, one is in secondary school and the two youngest attend the local elementary school.  Her husband’s a professional driver; he drives a bus.  The house they live in is the result of their joint work as a couple.

In addition to caring for her home, Rosa also works in the fields allowing her to improve her home’s economy; she plants vegetables that she sells in her community.  She also raises animals like pigs, guinea pigs, chickens and cattle.  Her most important task in to continue preserving her parents’ traditions so she also works making straw hats.

She will use her new loan to buy animal feed and will also buy hat-making straw to make her hats.
.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and straw.

loans.name: Hortencia Dolores

texts.es:
La Señora. Hortensia es socia del banco comunal Las Toquilleras, todos sus miembros viven cerca del cantón Sigsig, lugar que está rodeado de montañas las que nos regalan hermosos paisajes, la mayoría de las  mujeres de este cantón se dedican a los quehaceres de sus hogares, trabajan en la agricultura, crían animales o realizan sombreros de paja toquilla, muchos trabajan en la ciudad, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Hortensia tiene 40 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 20, 17, 14 y 12 años de edad, su primer hijo trabaja para solventar sus gastos personales y sus tres últimos hijos están estudiando en un colegio de la localidad. Su esposo trabaja como jornalero, la casa es de su propiedad siendo el fruto del trabajo conyugal. 

Ella se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y a la cría de animales como: cerdos y cuyes, también labora tejiendo sombreros de paja toquilla actividad que aprendió de su madre.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para iniciar con la crianza de estos animales.
 
Su meta es tener un negocio propio como un local para vender ropa.
texts.en:
Hortensia is a member of the Las Toquilleras communal bank.  All of the members live near the Sigsig canton, a place that is surrounded by mountains that gift us with beautiful scenery.  Most of the women in this canton devote themselves to the household chores, work in agriculture, raise animals, or make straw hats.  A lot of them work in the city, and they still maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.

Hortensia, age 40, is married and has four children, ages 20, 17, 14, and 12.  Her first son works to pay his personal expenses, and her last three children attend a local school.  Her husband works as a day worker.  The house is her own property, as it is the fruit of their marital efforts.

She devotes herself to the household chores, and she raises animals like pigs and guinea pigs.  She also works weaving straw hats, a business activity that she learned from her mother.

She will use the loan to buy chickens to start raising them.

Her goal is have her own business like a place to sell clothes.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Guadalupe habitante del barrio memorial Sandino de la cuidad de Managua, tiene 3 hijos quienes estudian y dependen de ella, su pareja labora como celador con sus ingresos aporta para los gastos del hogar y ella trabaja como conserje en una escuela pública. Esta es su primer experiencia crediticia con AFODENIC para la construcción de un muro perimetral de su vivienda que tiene que realizar en forma de una L para ofrecer seguridad y bienestar a su familia ya que viven en una zona un poco despoblada y es peligroso para los niños;  por lo que necesita comprar hierro, alambre, cemento, arena, bloques y el pago de la mano de obra.
texts.en:
Guadalupe lives in the Memorial Sandino neighborhood in the city of Managua. She has three children who go to school and depend on her. Her partner works as a security guard, and with his income contributes to the household expenses. She works as a janitor in a public school. 

This is her first loan with Afodenic, and is for building a perimeter wall for her home. She has to build it in the form of an "L," so that it can provide security and a sense of well-being to her family. This is because they live in an area that is a bit sparsely populated, and is dangerous for the children. So she needs to buy rebar, wire, cement, sand and cement blocks, as well as pay for labor.

loans.use: To buy rebar, wire, cement, sand, cement blocks, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Buscando El Exito  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Buscando el Éxito está formado por 15 socias quienes en su mayoría trabajan en un mercado de la ciudad, realizan diferentes actividades de comercio como  venta de frutas y verduras o en la preparación y venta de comida, estos negocios les dan la oportunidad de mejorar la economía de sus hogares y salir adelante con sus familias, todas son mujeres emprendedoras que buscan su bienestar. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene un clima frió, su Centro Histórico es una mezcla de la arquitectura moderna y colonial, cuenta con una gran variedad en su gastronomía típica la que deleita el paladar de sus visitantes, su gente aun mantiene viva su cultura y tradiciones. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Nancy, se encuentra realizando el segundo crédito en el banco comunal Buscando el Éxito, vive por el sector de Totoracocha en la ciudad de Cuenca, tiene 40 años de edad, es casada y ha concebido 3 hijos de 16, 14 y 5 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en un colegio de la ciudad y su último hijo estudia en la escuelita. Su esposo es comerciante, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.

Doña Nancy se dedica los quehaceres de su hogar y pasa al cuidado de toda su familia, para ayudar en la economía de su hogar  trabaja tejiendo una gran variedad de productos como: bufandas y chompas, actividad que aprendió sola por habilidad, ahora vende a sus amigas y conocidas.

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de hilos para continuar con esta actividad.

Su meta es tener un restaurante
texts.en:
The "Buscando el Éxito" communal bank is made up of 15 members, the majority of whom work in a market in the city, and carry on various businesses, such as selling fruit and vegetables or preparing and selling food. These businesses give them the opportunity of improving their household finances and helping their families move forward in life. 

All are enterprising women who seek prosperity. They live in various parts of Cuenca, a city that has a cold climate. Its historic center is a mix of modern and colonial architecture, and it has a great variety of traditional cuisine that delights the palate. Its people still keep alive their culture and traditions. 

One of the members of this group is Nancy. She is taking out her second loan as a  member of the "Buscando el Éxito" communal bank. She lives in the Totoracocha area of the city Cuenca. She is 40 years old, married, and has three children, ages 16,14 and 5. Her first two children go to a school in the city, and her youngest child goes to preschool. 

Her husband is a merchant, and the house where they live belongs to them. Nancy does her household chores and spends her time looking after the whole family. 

To help with the household finances, she works knitting a great variety of items, such as scarves and sweaters. She learned this work on her own, as she had an aptitude for it. Now she sells to her friends and acquaintances. She is going to use the loan to buy yarn, so that she can continue this work.

Her goal is to have a restaurant.

loans.use: To buy yarn.

loans.name: Felix Gabriel

texts.es: El señor felix, es una persona de 43 años de edad, de estado civil casado, alcanzo a estudiar el bachillerato en humanidades, cuenta con 6 dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus hijos y actualmente trabaja en el magisterio que se halla situado en la comunidad de Toralapa Alta del municipio de Tíraque, distante aproximadamente a unos 70 Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba, ejerce el cargo de profesor interino de carpintería con una remuneración salarial mensual fija. Asimismo también el cliente como segunda actividad económica alternativa se dedican a la producción agrícola, producen junto a su esposa papa, cebada (grano) y avena para forraje en sus propios terrenos, pero en especial la papa manifiestan que hacen producir en compañía (es decir el cliente dispone el terreno, parte de insumos y la otra persona dispone la mano de obra y complemento de insumos y a la cosecha el rendimiento se dividen en partes iguales). Y finalmente los clientes manifiestan tener el deseo de comprar un pequeño lote para vivienda y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión.
texts.en: Felix is 43 years old, married and has a degree in Humanities. He has six children under his care, and her currently works at a school in the community of Toralapa Alta, municipality of Tíraque, about 70 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba. He serves as an interim professor of carpentry and earns a fixed monthly salary. Also, as a second source of income, he works in agriculture, producing potatoes, barley and oats with his wife on their own lands. He grows potatoes in particular, which he does collectively (that is to say, Felix is responsible for the land and part of the supplies, and another person is responsible for the labor costs and the other part of the supplies, and at harvest time they divide the crops equally). Lastly, he says his wish is to buy a small plot of land for a home, but first he needs to request a loan to have working capital.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Edwin Mauricio

texts.es: Don Edwin tiene 5 hijos que dependen de él, posee desde hace 10 años un taller de carpintería donde elabora guitarras que comercializa en uno de los mercados más grandes de Managua, en conjunto con la ayuda de sus hijos los hace, negocio con el que ha sacado adelante a su familia cubriendo gastos de escuela y alimentación, su pareja se encarga del orden y el buen funcionamiento del hogar. Esta es su primer experiencia de crédito que solicita para la construcción de un muro perimetral de su vivienda, por lo que necesita realizar para la mejor condición de su casa, para dicho objetivo comprara, cemento, hierro,  bloque, arena de esa manera ira haciéndole mejoras a la misma.
texts.en:
Edwin has five dependent children. For ten years, he has owned a carpentry workshop where he makes guitars with the help of his children. He sells the guitars in one of the largest markets in Managua. This business has helped him to maintain his family, covering school fees and food expenses. His spouse is in charge of organizing and running the household.

This is Edwin's first loan, which he has requested in order to construct a wall surrounding his house. He needs this in order to improve the condition of his home. For this purpose, he will buy cement, iron, cinderblocks, and sand, thus enabling him to make improvements to his house.

loans.use: To buy cement, iron, cinderblocks, and sand.

loans.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es: Doña María Nicolasa tiene la edad de 45 años es casada su esposo trabaja de conductor en un recorrido escolar,  2 de sus hijas siendo la mayor de 22 años de edad solteras, trabajan y estudian en la universidad la carrera de farmacia y administración de empresas, su mayor sueño será verlas convertidas en grandes profesionales por lo que María trabaja arduamente vendiendo cosméticos, ropa nueva, sus créditos los ha utilizado en invertir en su negocio ahora los utilizara para construir parte del muro frontal de su casa debido a que se le mete el agua de la calle cuando llueve, quiere también subir el nivel de su terreno para lograr dicho objetivo comprara bloques, piedra cantera, cemento, hierro, arena y piedrín todo con el objetivo de ir mejorando  la infraestructura de su vivienda con apoyo de préstamo.
texts.en:
María Nicolasa is 45 years old and married. Her husband works as a driver on a school route. They have two children, both single, the oldest of whom is 22 years old. They work and study pharmacy and business administration at university. 

María's dream is to see her daughters become great professionals. Towards this end, she works hard selling cosmetics and new clothes. She has used her previous loans to invest in her business, but she will use this loan to construct part of the front wall of her house, because currently water comes in from the street when it rains. 

She also wants to raise the level of her plot of land. To accomplish this goal, she will buy cinderblocks, paving stone, cement, iron, sand, and gravel. Her objective is to improve the infrastructure of her home with the help of this loan.

loans.use: To buy cinderblocks, paving stones, cement, iron, sand, and gravel.

loans.name: Felix De La Cruz

texts.es:
Felix tiene 56 años, vive en la cálida ciudad de Nazca al lado de sus esposa y de sus 5 hijos, a los cuales quiere mucho y sobre todo por quienes lucha cada día para hacerlos personas de bien y sobre todo sean mejores que el. Felix trabaja como Guardián en un colegio de su ciudad, trabaja alrededor de 12 horas diarias pero también tiene una pequeña parcela en la cual siembra café y con el fruto de sus trabajo puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos familiares; el cree que le va bien en sus trabajos porque es responsable y porque sus hijos lo impulsan a luchar cada día.

Félix está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá ayudar a su hijo con los gastos de Titulación ya que el está estudiando Farmacia y está a punto de culminar su carrera, de esta manera su hijo podrá tener su titulo y poder buscar un empleo de acuerdo a su profesión, así el podrá cumplir una parte de su gran sueño el cual es ver a sus hijos hechos unos profesionales”.
texts.en:
Felix, 56, lives in the hot city of Nazca alongside his wife and five children who he loves very much and for whom he strives daily to turn them into upstanding citizens so that they will be better than him.

Felix works as a caretaker at a school in his city about 12 hours daily but also has a small parcel of land where he grows coffee.  He’s able to cover most of his household expenses with the fruits of his labors.  He believes he does well in his work because he’s responsible and because his children motivate him to strive harder every day.

Felix is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to help his son with his final course expenses.  He’s studying pharmacy and is about to graduate.  In this way, his son will be able to get his degree and look for employment according to his profession and Felix will be able to see part of his great dream become reality: to see his children become professionals.

loans.use: to pay for his son's final course fees.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Doña Estela, de 41 años de edad, su pareja de vida y ella trabajan como ayudante de proceso en una empacadora, su hija de 17 años estudia el 4to año de secundaria, sus créditos los ha venido utilizando para compra y venta de ropa nueva pero llego al fracaso porque mucha gente le quedaron debiendo y tuvo que trabajar como empleada doméstica, pero gracias a su pareja encontró un trabajo en el que tiene 2 años de desempeñar, sus créditos los ha utilizado para mejora de infraestructura de su vivienda, ahora los quiere para construir un muro perimetral en la parte de enfrente de su terreno debido a que se le mete agua de la calle cuando llueve mucho, para dicho objetivo necesitara comprar bloques, piedras cantera, cemento, hierro, arena y piedrín, de esa manera ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Estela’s 41-years-old.  She and her life partner work as process assistants at a packing plant.  Her 17-year-old daughter is in 4th year of secondary school.  She had been using her loans to buy and sell new clothes but she failed because many people did not pay her and she had to go work as a domestic employee but thanks to her spouse was able to secure employment that she’s been in for two years now.  She’s used her loans to make improvements to her house’s infrastructure and now she wants to build a perimeter wall in front of her property because when it rains a lot water comes in from the street.  In order to do this project she needs to buy concrete blocks, paving stones, cement, iron, sand and gravel.  In this way she’ll be improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy concrete blocks, paving stones, cement, iron, sand and gravel.

loans.name: Lester Antonio

texts.es: Don Lester, tiene 44 años es conductor de buses su esposa lava y plancha ropa ajena ambos trabajan de sol a sol para la manutención de sus tres hijos siendo la mayor de 17 años, su deseo y principal meta es que ellos sean grandes profesionales en la vida y se puedan valer solos, sus créditos los ha venido utilizando en mejoras del hogar, su ultimo logro fue cambiar el techo de su casa, ahora con este nuevo crédito desea instalar los servicios higiénicos, para esto comprara bloques, cemento, arena, hierro, piedra cantera, tubos, inodoros, estribos todo en busca de progreso y bienestar para la familia.
texts.en:
Lester, 44, is a bus driver and his wife takes in laundry from third parties to wash and iron.  They both work sun to sun to support their three children the oldest being a 17-year-old daughter.  His main wish and main goal is that they become great professionals in life so that they can support themselves.

He’s been using his loans to make home improvements.  He used the last one to replace the roof on his house and will now use this new one to install a bathroom.  To do so he will buy concrete blocks, cement, sand, iron, paving stones, pipes, toilets and braces.  All of this is to seek progress and wellbeing for the family.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Brenda Maria

texts.es: Brenda una joven emprendedora de 23 años de edad vive, en el municipio de Ticuantepe es casada su esposo se dedica al trabajo de mensajero en una farmacia, tienen un hijo de 4 años,  ella dio inicio a su negocio por la falta de empleo hoy en día vende productos de cosméticos y ropa por catálogos; siendo esta su primer experiencia crediticia que solicita para compra de materiales para realizar un cuarto por lo que necesita para levantar la obra arena, cemento, bloques y hierro, para ella el comienzo le fue muy difícil por la falta de capital y conocimiento de negocio pero ahora tiene buena clientela y la mayor parte están al día. En un futuro piensan poner una pequeña tienda en la comodidad de su hogar y así brindar mejor atención a su hijo.
texts.en: Brenda, 23, is a young entrepreneur living in the municipality of Ticuantepe.  She’s married and her husband works as a delivery person in a pharmacy.  They have a four-year-old son.  She started her business due to the lack of employment nowadays; she sells cosmetics and clothes via catalogue.  Starting out for her was very difficult due to lack of capital and limited business knowledge but now she has a good clientele and most of them are up to date.  In future, they plan to open a small convenience store at home to better care for her son. This is her first credit experience.  She’s requesting a loan to buy building materials and supplies to build a room.  To do the project she needs to buy sand, cement, concrete blocks and iron.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Eddy Orlando

texts.es: Don Eddy de la edad de 48 años vive en el municipio de Ticuantepe, es empleado de una financiera desde hace dos años, esta es la primer experiencia crediticia que va a emplear Eddy con el objetivo de mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda realizando un cuarto dándole fino a la pared de su casa, por lo que necesita comprar bloques, cemento, arena, hierro y piedrín, el es ingeniero agrónomo, casado la esposa es comerciante tienen un pequeño negocio en su casa con lo que se ayudo para el sustento diario de sus 2 hijos quienes ahora son mayores de edad, independientes y le ayudan a sus padres.
texts.en:
Eddy, 48, lives in Ticuantepe.  He’s been employed by a financial institution for two years.  This is his first credit experience.  Eddy will use it to make improvements to his house’s infrastructure.  He will add a room and fine touch the walls in his house.  To do so he needs to buy concrete blocks, cement, iron and gravel.  

He’s an agronomist, married and his wife’s a merchant.  They have a small, home-based business that helped him with the daily support of his two children who are now independent adults and who help out their parents.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Aleyda Del Socorro

texts.es: La joven Aleyda trabaja como ejecutiva de ventas de foto y video  desde hace 3 años, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo para los gastos del hogar, ambos son trabajadores, existen buenas referencia crediticias, personales y laborales de ella y su familia, no tiene hijos lo que ganan es para sus gastos familiares y para mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Solicita crèdito para invertirlo en pequeña reparaciòn de su cocina por lo que necesita comprar materiales como cemento, arena, bloques, hierro y piedrin; su mayor sueño en la vida es culminar sus estudios universitarios, gozar de salud y trabajo.
texts.en:
Aleyda has been working for three years as a photo and video sales executive.    Her husband helps her pay household expenses.  They both work and she and her family have good personal, credit and work references.  She does not have any children; what they earn is for their family expenses and to improve their living conditions.

She’s requesting the loan to do a small kitchen repair.  To do so she needs to buy supplies like cement, sand, concrete blocks, iron and gravel.  Her greatest dream in life is to complete her university education, to have good health and work.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Jairo Francisco

texts.es: Jairon Francisco de 22 años de edad es soltero, trabaja como locutor de radio desde hace mas de 3 años. Solicita su segundo credito para mejorar la vivienda de su mamá donde el habita con ella y desea construir su propio cuarto el cual acondicionara para contar con un mejor entorno de vida por lo que necesita comprar materiales de construccion como lo son: cemento, arena, hierro, piedrin y el pago de la mano de obra. Siendo una persona con muchos deseos de superacion, su mayor sueño es seguir teniendo trabajo y apoyar a su mamá en lo que mas pueda.
texts.en: Jairon Francisco, 22, is single and has been working as a radio commentator for more than three years.  He’s requesting his second loan to improve his mother’s house where he lives with her.  He wants to build his own bedroom that he’ll furnish in order to have a more comfortable environment.  To do so he needs to buy building materials and supplies like cement, sand, iron and gravel as well as to pay labor costs.  Being a person with a strong desire for self-improvement, his greatest dream is to continue to have work and to support his mother as best he can.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Deyvi De Los Santos

texts.es: El joven Deyvi de la edad de 27 años, trabaja en una gasolinera como supervisor desde hace 6 años, tiene su pareja pero aún no se ha casado su compañera trabaja como ejecutiva de ventas. Este es su primer préstamo que él solicita para comprar materiales de construcción tales como bloques, cemento, cuartones de 2x2, láminas de zinc, hojas de plisen, para remodelar un cuarto de la casa. Sus planes también es remodelar la habitación para su futuro hijo que viene en camino que para él es un regalo de Dios y que espera con muchas ansias, ya que es su primogénito.
texts.en:
Deyvi, twenty-seven, has been working in a filling station, as a supervisor, for six years. He is in a relation, but he is not married yet. His girlfriend works as a sales executive.

This is his first loan. He needs to buy construction materials, such as bricks, cement, 2x2 lumbers, zinc sheets and fiberboard to remodel one of the rooms in his house. He is also planning to remodel a room for his soon-to-be-born son, a gift from God. He cannot wait to meet him, since it will be his firstborn child.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, 2x2 lumbers, zinc sheets and fiberboard.

loans.name: María Teresa

texts.es:
La Señora María es una de la socia fundadoras del banco comunal La Merced, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia de Santa Ana en Cuenca, lugar que se encuentra rodeado de montañas lo cual nos regala hermosos paisajes, su clima es frió, pero el corazón de su gente es muy cálido, trabajan en diferentes actividades en especial el comercio, cría de animales y la agricultura, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones que un día sus padres les inculcaron.

Doña María tiene 51 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, casados y viven independiente. La casa en la que vive el fruto de su trabajo.
 
Ella trabaja de lunes a sábados como empleada domestica sin un horario fijo, en su casa se dedica a la crianza de cerdos.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir una parte para la compra de cerdos y también en materiales de construcción para el arreglo de su vivienda que se encuentra un poco deteriorada.

Su meta es mejorar su casa.
texts.en: María is one of the founding members of La Merced communal bank. She lives near the parish of Santa Ana in Cuenca, a place surrounded by mountains that make for some beautiful landscapes. The weather is cold, but the people's hearts are warm. The inhabitants work mainly in trade, animal husbandry, and agriculture. They still uphold the culture and traditions of their forefathers. María is fifty-one and a single mother of two sons, who are adults, married, and living separately. She lives in a house that she owns thanks to her hard work. She works from Monday to Saturday as a domestic worker, without a fixed schedule. At home, she raises pigs. She will use part of her loan to buy pigs and the rest to buy construction materials to repair her house, which wants fixing a bit. Her goal is to improve her house.

loans.use: to buy pigs and construction materials.

loans.name: Laura María

texts.es:
La Señora. Laura forma parte del banco comunal La Merced hace 8 años, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia de Santa Ana en Cuenca, lugar que se encuentra rodeado de montañas lo cual nos regala hermosos paisajes, su clima es frió pero el corazón de su gente es muy cálido, trabajan en diferentes actividades en especial el comercio, cría de animales y la agricultura, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones que un día sus padres les inculcaron.

La Señora Laura tiene 37 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos  de 16, 12, 9 y 6 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en el colegio y sus dos últimos hijos estudian en una escuelita de la comunidad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, la casa en la que viven es el fruto del trabajo conyugal.

Doña Laura hace 7 años tiene una tienda en donde trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo y como es una mujer emprendedora hace 4 meses puso una panadería en donde  elabora varios productos.

Su crédito lo va a invertir para la compra de harina, huevos, mantequilla, azúcar, etc. para la elaboración del pan y crecer en este negocio que hace poco inicio. 

Su meta es tener una panadería más grande y seguir incrementando maquinaria que le hace falta.
texts.en: Laura has belonged to La Merced communal bank for eight years. She lives in the neighbourhood of the parish of Santa Ana in Cuenca, a place surrounded by mountains that make for some beautiful landscapes. The weather is cold but the people's hearts are warm. The inhabitants work mainly in trade, animal husbandry, and agriculture. They still uphold the culture and traditions of their forefathers. Laura is thirty-seven years old, married, and has four children, aged 16, 12, 9, and 6. The oldest two go to secondary school and the youngest two go to primary school in the neighbourhood. Her husband is an employee in the private sector, and they own the house they live in thanks to their hard work. Laura started her shop seven years ago. She works every single day of the week without a fixed schedule and, since she is very keen on developing her business, she started a bakery four months ago. She  bakes various products. She will use the loan to buy ingredients such as flour, eggs, butter, sugar, etc. in order to bake bread and make this new business of hers grow. Her goal is to own a bigger bakery and to buy the machines she needs.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to bake with.

loans.name: Bilma Raquel

texts.es:
La Señora. Bilma hace algún tiempo forma parte del banco comunal La Merced, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia de Santa Ana en Cuenca, lugar que se encuentra rodeado de montañas lo cual nos regala hermosos paisajes, su clima es frió, pero el corazón de su gente es muy cálido, trabajan en diferentes actividades en especial el comercio, cría de animales y la agricultura, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones que un día sus padres les inculcaron.

La Señora, Bilma tiene 30 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 12, 10 y 1 año de edad, sus dos primeros hijos están estudiando en una escuelita. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora prestando sus servicios en el transporte público, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de sus padres compartiendo gastos del hogar.

Ella se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y  también cría animales a los que los vende en su comunidad, esto le permite aportar a la economía de su hogar.

Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de cerdos y la cancelación de su crédito lo ha realizado en las fechas correspondientes. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir comprando más cerdos y alimento para todos sus animales, un poco también lo va a utilizar para los útiles escolares de sus hijos.  La banca comunal le gusta por el compañerismo que existe en el grupo, los créditos son rápidos y no se necesita de muchos papeleos.
texts.en: Bilma has been a member of the La Merced communal bank for some time. She lives in the Santa Ana parish, located in the southeast of Cuenca. The mountains surrounding the city make for some beautiful landscapes. The climate is cold, but the people's hearts are warm. Its residents raise livestock, farm, or are traders, and they still live according to the culture and the traditions of their forefathers. Bilma is 30 years old, married, and has three children, aged 12, 10, and 1. Her two oldest attend school. Her husband is a driver and provides public transportation services. They don’t have a home of their own, but live in their parents’ home and share in the household expenses. Bilma takes care of the housework and also raises animals to sell in her area, which enables her to help with the expenses. Her previous loan she invested in buying pigs, and repaid on time. She will use this new loan to buy more pigs as well as animal feed for all her animals, and she will also use a small part to buy school supplies for her sons. She likes her communal bank because the group is very tightly knit, the loans are quickly processed and the paperwork is kept to a minimum.

loans.use: to buy pigs, animal feed, and school supplies.

loans.name: Señoras De La Buena Esperanza (Biblian) Group

texts.es:
Señoras de la Buena Esperanza es un banco comunal que está realizando su primer crédito, se encuentra conformado por 6 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por el cantón de Biblian en la vecina provincia del Cañar, tierra de la toquillera y verdes páramos, se encuentra bañada por las serpenteantes aguas del Burgay, su clima es frió, su gastronomía típica es variada. Su gente es muy amable, gentil y tienen un corazón muy cálido, así lo demuestran las socias de este banco comunal quienes aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, laboran a diario en diferentes actividades económicas las que les permiten mejorar la economía de sus hogares para sacar  adelante a sus familias, sus actividades principales son la crianza de animales, la agricultura y el comercio.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María Inés, es una mujer muy joven tiene que 20 años de edad y es madre soltera de una niña de 5 años, vive en casa de su madre con quien comparte los gastos del hogar, la casa en la que vive es propiedad de su madre.

Ella trabaja de lunes a domingos y desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde en una plantación de flores donde le pagan un sueldo mensual, y en su casa se dedica a la crianza de ganado y gallinas, estos trabajos los realiza para mejorar su situación económica.
 
Este crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para incrementar sus animales.

Su meta es tener su propia casa.
texts.en: Señoras de la Buena Esperanza ('Ladies of the Good Hope') is a communal bank taking out its first loan. The members of the group are six women and one man. They all live in the commune of Biblian in the province of El Cañar, the home of Toquilla straw weaving and green foliage. Surrounded by the meandering waters of the Burgay river, it has a cold climate but boasts a varied cuisine. The people are nice, honest, and have a warm heart. The members of the group are no exception, who still uphold the culture and traditions of their forefathers. They works every day at their various businesses, which enables them to contribute to their respective households' expenses in order to improve their families' quality of life. They work mainly in agriculture, animal husbandry, and trade. One of the members is María Inés, a very young woman of twenty, single mother to a girl of five. María Inés lives at her mother's and together they share expenses. The house belongs to her mother. María Inés works Mondays to Sundays from seven in the morning to four in the afternoon at a flower farm, where she receives a monthly salary. At home, she raises cattle and chickens in order to improve her income. She will use this loan to buy chickens in order to increase the number of her animals. Her goal is to one day own a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Soeurt's Group

texts.en: Residing from Sangke district of Cambodia, Soeurn needs to support her entire family through rice farming. She has seven children, three of whom are still in school. She grows paddy rice and it is the only business that she has done for 30 years. Soeurt's group consists of three female members; she and one of her co-members are fifth-time borrowers while the remaining member is a third-time borrower. Soeurn has managed to pay back her entire past loan with success and it has helped her to overcome her family's hardships in time. Now, she is the leader of this group. For her loan portion, she is going to purchase fertilizer and rice-seed. She hopes to increase crop output and maximize her profit.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and rice seed

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia; ella posee una pequeña tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, especias, producto instantáneo, entre otros, adicional a esto sale a vender pan a los alrededores de su comunidad para así complementar los gastos del hogar, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho experiencia valiosa en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, ya posee mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; Elena es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor  y con muchos sueños por delante, quiere un futuro mejor y todos los días se esfuerza con amor y constancia porque sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito que tanto desea, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, pan, especies, etc. Elena tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y ala vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elena, age 52, lives with her life partner and her son in her own house.  She has a small store where she sells basic needs items, basic grains, spices, and instant products, among others.  In addition to this, she goes out to sell bread in the areas surrounding her community.  She does this in order to contribute to the household expenses.

She has had the business for several years.  It has been a valuable experience in that the sales allow her to get greater income.  She has a lot of clientele because people prefer her quality, good prices, and excellent service.

Elena is a very enterprising woman who is devoted to her work.  She has a lot of dreams ahead of her, and she wants a better future.  She works hard every day with love and constancy because she knows it is the only way she will achieve the success that she so desires.

In the past weeks demand has increased, and she wants to take advantage of that by making a new investment.  That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, bread, and spices, etc.  

She has good payment references, and she is very responsible.  She assures that she will be able to repay the debt, and she is confident that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, bread, and spices.

loans.name: Florentina

texts.es: Florentina vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia; ella posee una tortillería desde hace ya varios años, el trabajo le ha regalado gran experiencia en la elaboración y venta de tortillas y eso le ayuda a obtener siempre las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda en una zona muy transitada de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela y la prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de calidad, a precio accesible y además con un servicio excelente; Florentina se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad y honestidad, es una mujer ejemplar, emprendedora y  dedicada a su labor siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le abran camino al éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, pero para ello necesita de capital, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. Florentina tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Florentina lives with her partner and two children in their own home. She has had a tortillería for several years now. This work has provided her with great experience in making and selling tortillas. This has helped her to always make the best income. Her business is run from her home, which is located in a highly-trafficked area. She has a strong customer base who prefer her business because everything she sells is high-quality, well-priced, and sold with excellent service. Florentina is very kind and honest. She is an exemplary woman, enterprising and dedicated to her work. She is always ready for new opportunities that will open up avenues for success. In the last few weeks, demand has increased. She wants to take advantage of this and make a new investment. In order to do so, she needs capital. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Integral. This will allow her to buy corn wholesale. Florentina has good payment references and is very responsible. She assures us that she will repay her loan. She hopes that this will provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale.

loans.name: Rosa Elizabeth

texts.es: Rosa Elizabeth de cincuenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia; Ella se dedica a la venta de maíz desde el lugar de su residencia, tiene varios años con el negocio y ha adquirido mucha experiencia en las ventas lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias; comercia desde el hogar o de forma ambulante en algunos alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la buscan y la prefieren por la calidad de su producto, por los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Rosa se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad, es una mujer alegre, emprendedora y muy dedicada a su labor, siempre esta luchando por sus sueños, todos los días se esfuerza al máximo en su trabajo y los mas grandes secretos son la perseverancia y el amor saben que solo así con sabiduría podrá lograr el éxito, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y para ello necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. Rosa Elizabeth tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa Elizabeth, who is 54 years old, lives with her life companion in their own house. Her work is selling corn from her home. She has had this business for a number of years and has acquired a lot of experience in sales, which allows her to obtain the best earnings. She sells from her home or as a street vendor in some of the areas surrounding the community. She now has many customers, since people look for her and prefer her for the quality of her product, for her good prices, and above all for her excellent service. Rosa is characterized by her great friendliness. She is a happy woman, entrepreneurial, and very dedicated to her work. She is always working for her dreams. Every day she exerts herself to the maximum in her work. Her greatest secrets are perseverance and love. She knows that only this way with wisdom will she be able to achieve success. Like every good business person, she wants to increase her business, and to do that she needs capital. For this reason she applied to INTEGRAL for a loan that will permit her to buy corn wholesale. Rosa Elizabeth has good payment references and impeccable morals. She assures that she will be able to pay off the debt, and at the same time, she is confident that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale

loans.name: Arely De Jesus

texts.es: Arely de 50 años de edad, es una persona de excelente reputación, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos quienes se dedican a estudiar por tener un futuro mejor. Arely posee un puesto en el mercado de su municipio en donde comercializa diferentes tipos de medicinas, así mismo comercializa pañales desechables y leche para bebé. Este negocio lo posee desde hace muchos años por lo que es muy estable. Arely solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para surtir su negocio y así de esta manera ir adquiriendo nuevos clientes, lo que es fundamental para ella.
texts.en: Arely is 50 years old and is a person with an excellent reputation.  She lives with her husband and two children who study in order to have a better future.  Arely owns a stall in the market of her town where she sells different types of medicines.  She also sells disposable diapers and formula for infants.  She has owned this business for many years and thus it is very stable.  Arely is asking for a loan from Kiva partner INTEGRAL, through which she will be able to obtain the money necessary in order to supply her business and in that way go about acquiring new clients, which is fundamental for her.

loans.use: To purchase medicines to sell.

loans.name: Oscar Vidal

texts.es: Oscar de 41 años de edad es un hombre muy trabajador con deseos de superación para el y su familia, la cual esta conformada por su esposa y dos hijos menores de edad. Oscar trabaja en su propio taller de costura donde cose ropa por encargo y así mismo posee un molino que alquila para que las personas muelan alimentos como frijoles y maíz. Oscar reside en un municipio con mucha demanda para la costura por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de telas, hilos, botones, agujas y otros más para poder aceptar más trabaja y de esta manera aumentar sus ingresos lo cual será de mucho beneficio para su familia.
texts.en: Oscar is 41 years old and is a very hard-working man with desires to get ahead for himself and his family.  His family is made up of his wife and his two minor children.  Oscar works in his own taylor shop where he sews clothing on order and he also owns a mill that he rents out so that people can grind their own foods like beans and corn.  Oscar lives in a town with great demand for sewing which is why he is asking for a loan from Kiva partner INTEGRAL, in order to count on the money necessary in order to purchase a larger quantity of fabrics, threads, buttons, needles and other items in order to be able to accept more work and in that way increase his income, which will be of great benefit to his family.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity of fabrics, threads, buttons, needles and other items

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es: María Elizabeth de cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a sus tres hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, camisas, blusas, pantalones, vestidos, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y ha adquirido gran experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su casa y de forma ambulante por todos  un los alrededores de la comunidad donde vive, se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque la prefieren por la calidad, loso buenos precios y un servició excelente ; María es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le abran puertas al éxito pues sabe que solo así lograra lo que desea, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor . María Elizabeth tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy respónsale, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a al vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Elizabeth, 55, lives with her three children in her own house.  She makes a living selling clothing: shirts, blouses, pants, and dresses, among other things.  She has worked for several years in this business and has acquired a lot of experience in sales, which allows her to get the best profits.  She sells from home and as a street vendor throughout the outskirts of the community where she lives.  She has acquired a lot of customers because they prefer her for her quality, good prices, and excellent service.

María is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her job and very much wants to get ahead.  She's always waiting for new opportunities that will open the door to success, because she knows that only that way will she achieve what she wants.

Demand has increase in the last few weeks and she wants to make the most of it to make a new investment, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy clothing wholesale.

María Elizabeth has a good payment record and is very responsible.  She's certain she'll be able to pay back the debt and trusts that she'll give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale

loans.name: Silvia Elizabeth

texts.es: Silvia de 34 años de edad, madre soltera de dos hijas de 13 y 8 años de edad, es muy trabajadora ya que debe sostener ella sola a su familia. Silvia se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado, en donde ofrece algunas variedades de verduras y que cuentan con mucha demanda. Con el deseo de mejorar ante su competencia, la cual es mucha, ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar más variedad de verduras como: repollo, yuca, chiles, coliflor, cebollas y otros más. Silvia ansía mejorar sus ganancias ya que es su única fuente de ingresos y debe mantener a sus dos hijas quienes son su prioridad y desea entregarles todo lo mejor, lo cual logrará gracias a dicho préstamo ya que este representa la llave para mejorar.
texts.en: Silvia is 34 years old. She is a single mother of two daughters, ages 13 and 8. She is very hard-working, since she has to support her family by herself. Silvia sells vegetables in the market, where she offers several varieties of vegetables for which there is much demand. With the desire to improve over her competition, which is great, she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan, with which she can buy a greater variety of vegetables such as cabbage, yucca, chiles, cauliflower, onions, and others. Silvia longs to improve her earnings, since it is her only source of income and she needs to support her two daughters, who are her priority. She wants to give them all the best, which she will manage thanks to this loan, since this represents the key to improve.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Marlon

texts.en:
Marlon has engaged in producing rice for 20 years. His long experience in farming permits him to be strategic about his farming activities. Marlon aims to obtain a higher yield in each successive harvest. 
Marlon, 40, is married to a loving wife and blessed with five children. Marlon's priority in life is to send his children to school and through college. He says education is the only treasure he can give his children.
Marlon works hard, and he continuously refines his farming strategies in pursuit of his goals. Financial challenges are the main obstacle to attaining his goals. For this reason, Marlon is requesting a loan of 45,000 PHP to buy herbicides, pesticides and fertilizers to use on his farm. He hopes that applying these inputs will have positive effects on his business of producing rice.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, pesticides and fertilizers to use on his rice farm.

loans.name: Karla Iveth

texts.es: Karla de 24 años de edad es comerciante de oficio, y vive junto a dos hijos y una hermana con quien trabajan muy duro para suplir las necesidades básicas de su hogar. Ella se dedica a la venta ambulante de pantalones, blusas, shorts, calcetines, camisetas y otros más, su venta es estable y cuenta con varios clientes fijos. Debido a que la temporada de fin de años se aproxina, tiempo en el que la demanda crece, Karla solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda surtir su venta y aceptar más pedidos lo que es muy positivo para su crecimiento como comerciante.  Karla es muy amable, lo que también le ayuda a que las personas prefieran comprar sus productos, lo que es una cualidad que aprovechas para mantener su negocio y mejorar.
texts.en: Karla, age 24, is a merchant. She lives with her two children and one sister. They work hard together in order to provide their household with the basic necessities. Karla sells pants, shirts, shorts, socks, and other items door to door. Her sales are stable and she has several loyal customers. Because the new year, a time of higher demand, is approaching, Karla is requesting a loan from Integral through which she will be able to stock her store and accept more orders. This will be very positive for her growth as a merchant. Karla is very kind, which also helps her business; people want to buy her products. She takes advantage of this in order to maintain her business and improve.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie raises hogs and sells them when they reach optimum growth. She is currently raising a sow and a piglet and fattening three hogs. Rosemarie wants to ensure their proper nutrition, so she can sell them for better prices.

Rosemarie is a widow, a business-oriented woman. Whenever she sells a mature hog, she immediately replaces it with new one. This strategy has had a great impact on the profit she generates. Rosemarie would like to have continuous growth in her hog-raising business, so she is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000, which will allow her to buy more livestock, as well as vitamins for her hogs. She knows that this loan will permit her to earn greater profits, to meet all the needs of her household, and to devote some of the profit to the education of her youngest child.

loans.use: to buy livestock and vitamins for her hog-raising business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy buttons and thread to make clothing

loans.name: Agueda

texts.es: Agueda de 63 años de edad, vive sola en casa que alquila desde hace 25 años, ella es muy conocida en la zona lo que es muy positivo ya que posee una tienda en la que comercializa variedad de productos de primera necesidad; también tiene una tortillería donde a diario las elabora y comercializa, y vende gas propano. Agueda solicita un préstamo con el cual espera comprar más productos para su tienda, también comprar maíz para elaborar tortillas y surtir la tienda con gas propano. Agueda es muy trabajadora quien siempre esta dispuesta a mejorar su negocio y así contar con una vida estable y tranquila.
texts.en:
Agueda, 63, lives alone in a house she has rented for 25 years.  She's well known in the area, which is positive because she has a store where she sells a variety of staples.  She also has a tortilla shop where she makes and sells tortillas every day, and she sells propane gas.

Agueda is requesting a loan to buy more products for her store, and also corn to make tortillas and propane gas to supply the store.

Agueda is very hardworking and always ready to improve her business to have a stable and peaceful life.

loans.use: to buy corn, propane gas, and perishable products to sell

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
Emelyn is 40 years old, married with two school-age children. She is from the remote area of Maluno province of Isabela. Emelyn says even though her life is not that good, she still tries to do her best to give the daily needs of her family. Emelyn is asking a loan amounting Php 5,000 to buy new three tires and for the maintenance of her vehicle. Because she doesn't want her children to feel her past life, Emelyn wants to see her children finish their studies. She is a very loving and responsible mother according to her husband Elizalde. 

In the future, Emelyn hopes that her business expands to give a nice living condition to her family.

loans.use: to buy 3 new tires and some money for the maintenance of her tricycle

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Mame Bousso's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe faisant partie du Banc Villageois de Loyenne a été crée le 21 Décembre 2009. Il est composé de membres habitant le même quartier et ayant une bonne entente solidaire. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce . 

Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, la vedette Fatou est âgée de 50 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants. 

Son prêt reçu, elle va acheter des tissus teintés dans la sous-région et revenir revendre dans sa localité. 

Avec les bénéfices générés par l'activité, elle développe son activité et assure la prise en charge en charge de sa progéniture.
texts.en:
This group is part of the "Banc Villageois" of Loyenne and was created on December 21, 2009. It consists of members living in the same neighbourhood who have a good understanding of each other and show solidarity. Their primary business is shopkeeping. 

Standing to the right of the photo and raising her hand, the featured borrower Fatou is 50 years old. She is married and mother to 5 children. 

Once she receives her loan, she is going to buy dyed fabric in the sub-region and come back to resell it in her neighborhood. 

With the profits generated by this business, she is developing her business and ensures the care of her offspring.

loans.use: to buy dyed fabric in Mali and resell it in Diourbel.

loans.name: Déla

texts.fr: Infirmière-accoucheuse de profession, Marcelline est une femme mariée de 29 ans et mère d’un seul enfant de 08 mois. Elle a ouvert son poste de secours en 2009  et emploie 03 personnes et pour l’approvisionnement en équipement médical, elle sollicite son premier prêt auprès de WAGES. Comme prévision pour son activité, elle compte réaménager son poste de secours pour fournir des services de soins plus avancés et de cela assurer le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en: A nurse and midwife by profession, Marcelline is a 29 year old married woman and she is the mother of one 8 month old child. She opened her own emergency response office in 2009 and employs three people. In order to purchase medical supplies, she is seeking her first loan with WAGES. In order to enhance her business, she intends to renovate her emergency office in order to offer more advanced services, thus ensuring her own family's wellbeing.

loans.use: to purchase medicines.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Mère de 04 enfants dont 02 scolarisés, Adjo âgée de 43 ans, est une revendeuse de produits de mercerie. Son tout premier enfant a 20 ans et le dernier a 07 ans. Elle dispose d’une boutique et où elle commercialise ses produits et a commencé cette activité en 2008. Pour l’achat de stock de produits de mercerie, elle sollicite son second prêt auprès de WAGES. Elle envisage d’augmenter son chiffre d’affaire et améliorer le niveau de vie de ses enfants
texts.en: Adjo is 43 years old and has four children, two of whom are in school. She sells sewing supplies. Her eldest child is 20 years old, and her youngest is seven. She has a store where she sells her products. She has launched this business in 2008. She is seeking a second loan from WAGES in order to stock up on sewing supplies. She plans to increase her sales volume and improve the life quality of her children.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Mawuena

texts.fr: Mawuena est un jeune marié sans enfant de 30 ans, revendeur de produits congelés. Étant encore à ses débuts c'est-à-dire qu’il a débuté son commerce en 2011, il rencontre des difficultés de rupture de stock qui influencent directement le degré de satisfaction des clients. Pour pallier à ce problème, il sollicite son premier crédit auprès de WAGES pour renforcer son activité. Il compte réinvestir le profit dans son activité afin de pouvoir s’acheter des réfrigérateurs pour la distribution en gros.
texts.en:
Mawuena is a young married man of 30, with no children. He is a vendor of frozen products. Being a new business (he started his business in 2011) he has problems running out of stock, and this directly influences the level of satisfaction of his customers. In order to solve this issue, he is requesting his first loan with WAGES in order to strengthen his business. 
He intends to invest the profit back into his business in order to be able to purchase refrigeration units for wholesale distribution.

loans.use: to purchase frozen food products.

loans.name: Ruqayia's Group

texts.en:
Ruqaiya is a 48-year-old hard-working woman. She lives in Pakistan with her husband, two sons, and daughter. Her husband and one son work as laborers and her daughter is a student. Her husband's income is insufficient to meet the family's needs, so Ruqaiya is trying to help him fulfill their needs by stitching clothing. 

Since 2010 she has operated her tailoring business very efficiently, but she is currently in need of purchasing a new sewing machine, as her old machine is not working properly. To do that, she has requested a loan as a member of an eight-person group from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan so she can continue her business. With the profits she will pay the household expenses, put aside some savings, pay utility bills and open a new mobile shop for her elder son. She is hopeful that the loan will be a productive one for them. 

Note: In the picture Ruqaiya is carrying a pass book in hand.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine to continue her business.

loans.name: Lourdes Margarita

texts.es: Lourdes de estado civil soltera, tiene 2 hijos .Lourdes dice que ella en su negocio de carnicería .Ella  trabaja sola ya que ese ha sido su único medio de sustento para vivir y poder mantener a su familia. Una de las dificultades es que posee una pequeña cantidad de dinero pero .Con el  préstamo  ella va  a comprar carne de res y carne de cerdo etc.
texts.en: Lourdes is single and has two children. Lourdes says that she works alone in her butcher shop, and this has been her only means of support for living and being able to support her family. One of the difficulties is that she possesses a small amount of money but with the loan she will be able to buy beef and pork, etc.

loans.use: to buy beef and pork, etc.

loans.name: Angel Patricio

texts.es: Ángel de estado civil soltero, tiene 2 hijos. Angel nos cuenta que aprendió con su papa lo que era venta de mariscos .Pues ahora él se encarga de vender marisco y también alquilar una camioneta .El trabaja solo de 3:00am hasta 13:00pm. Con el préstamo para pagar las reparaciones de su vehículo y obtener un chequeo de salud
texts.en:
Ángel is single and has two children.  He said he learned the trade of selling seafood from his father.  Ángel now manages his own business of selling seafood, but he also has a vehicle that he makes available for rent.  He works by himself from 3:00 A.M. to 1:00 P.M.

With this loan he will repair his vehicle and get a health check up.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to his vehicle and to obtain a health checkup.

loans.name: Fuamoli

texts.en:
Fuamoli is 50 years old and has 5 children. She runs a small business selling fish in her community and has been doing this for 3 years. 

Fuamoli has requested a loan to buy fishing nets, hooks, baits, and a fishing boat. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Fuamoli hopes to buy some new roofing iron for her house.

loans.use: buy fishing net, hooks, baits and a new fishing boat.

loans.name: Waefeso Group

texts.en:
Henry, who is in his early 40s, is married and lives with his wife and his two children, who go to school.   For three years now, Henry has been earning a living by running a grocery business.  He works from midday to 10pm daily and he is able to make a good monthly profit.  

He is requesting a 10th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to buy more drinks, a fridge, a TV, and plastic chairs for the grocery business.  He has paid back all his loans successfully.  He is requesting the new loan to restock more drinks for the business to sell.  His dream is to one day be able to build his own nice house.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Waefeso" which totals 13 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock more drinks for his business to sell.

loans.name: Posia

texts.en:
Posia is a 32-year-old married woman with five children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and banana to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Posia has requested a loan to help pay for her childrens' education (school fees) and purchase barred wire, bush knives, wheelbarrow and fertilizer.

She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. With her profits, Posia hopes to expand her business and earn more.

loans.use: to pay for her childrens' education and purchase barred wire,bushknives,wheelbarrow and fertilizer

loans.name: Filomena

texts.en:
Filomena is an entrepreneur living in Annafunan with her spouse and one child. She sells fruits and vegetables at the public market where she rented a stall for her merchandise. She has been in business for over eight years now and usually gains P6,000 each month. She uses it to pay for school fees, meals, and stall rental fees. 

Filomena and her spouse manage the business well. She is now asking for a loan of P25,000 in order to increase her merchandise and alleviate income too. She will buy cabbages, tomatoes, beans, eggs and potatoes to sell.

With continuous effort, hard work, and good income, Filomena will achieve a progressive way of life someday.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, tomatoes, beans, eggs and potatoes to sell

loans.name: Fares

texts.en:
Fares is from Iraq. He is 40 years old, married and has four children. He is the only provider for the family.

Fares owns a small restaurant. He established his business in 2000 after gaining much experience in this field. Now he has two employees and a good reputation in his local community. Sometimes his son goes with him to the restaurant as shown in the picture to learn about the business.

He is requesting a $1500 loan to buy a generator. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a generator

loans.name: Mouthana

texts.en: Mouthana is from Iraq. He is 39 years old, married and has three children. He is the only provider for the family. Mouthana owns a car repair shop, which he established in 2003. He has a wealth of experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community. He is requesting a loan of $1800 to pay the annual rent for his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his shop

loans.name: Alfonso David

texts.es: Edison de estado civil divorciado tiene 1 hijo. Edison Comenzó trabajando hace ya  4 años en su propia empresa la cual es las elaboraciones de sandalias, la cual trabaja con sus hermanos .Su horario de trabajo comienza  a las 8.00am hasta 18.00pm. Su anhelo es ampliar su negocio. Con el préstamo El va a comprar cuerina,  plantilla etc
texts.en: Edison is divorced and has one son. Four years ago, he started his own sandal-making business in which he works with his brothers. He works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. His wish is to expand his business. With this loan, he will purchase faux leather, and soles.

loans.use: to purchase faux leather, and soles etc .

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: Humberto de estado civil casado tiene 2 hijos Humberto compro vitrinas y perchas de allí el vende laminas, cuadernos hasta artículos de bazar. Humberto Atiende su pequeño negocio solo. Ya que comienza a trabajar desde las 8.00am hasta las 10.00pm. El cuenta que al principio su zona era de mucha delincuencia y no había mucha productividad para su negocio  pero con el pasar del tiempo ha ido mejorando esas condiciones pues ahora le va muy bien  en su negocio y El  sueño de Humberto es ampliarlo más para poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus consumidores que dia a día le compran en su bazar. El  cuenta que quisiera arreglar su vivienda y el sueño de Humberto es comprarse un carro. Con el préstamo quisiera comprar: artículos para el bazar, papeles, láminas,  etc.
texts.en:
Humberto is married and has two children.  He bought a display case and hangers.  From here he sells decals, notebooks, and even bazaar type items.  Humberto takes care of his small business alone.  He starts work at 8:00 a.m., and he works until 10:00 p.m.  

He says that in the beginning there was a lot of delinquency in his area, and there was not much productivity in his business.  Little by little these conditions have been improving.  Now his business is going very well for him.  His dream is to expand it in order to satisfy the needs of the consumers who shop at his store daily.

He says that he would like to fix his house.  Humberto’s dream is to buy a car.  He would like to use the loan to buy bazaar items, papers, and decals, etc.

loans.use: to buy bazaar items, papers, and decals, etc.

loans.name: Gs Buenos Aires Group

texts.es:
El Señor Oscar, tiene 50 años de edad, tiene 5 hijos dependientes vive junto a su compañera de hogar, Su actividad principal es la caficultura el cuenta con 3 manzanas de café cosechera la que han sido su fuente principal de ingresos, tiene una experiencia de mas de 25 años, Don Oscar esta solicitando el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su finca de café Como ser la compra de fertilizantes, plaguicidas y pago de mano de obra de los empleados en la finca, siendo su adjetivo principal  mejorar la productividad de su finca ya que por la falta de financiamiento no le ha podido dar el mantenimiento adecuado, con  el apoyo del préstamo solicitado que reciba Don Oscar, le contribuirá a mejorar la producción de su finca de café, y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, junto con su esposa han trabajado mucho para contar con el patrimonio familiar ya que en esta actividad se tiene que trabajar muy duro.
Don Oscar uno de sus sueños es tener una mejores fincas tecnificadas  que le generaría recursos para darle una mejor calidad de vida su familia, junto a sus compañeros caficultores se asociaron para formar un grupo con el fin de solicitar un crédito para mejorar su fincas siendo los demás integrantes. Cristino, José y Maximiliano cada uno propietario de sus propias parcelas contando con mucha experiencia en el manejos de sus fincas.

Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - Septiembre 2012
texts.en:
Oscar, 50, has five dependent children; he lives with his housemate.  His main activity is growing coffee.  He has three manzanas [Central American unit of land measurement] of coffee; its harvest has been his main source of income.  He has more than 25 years’ experience.

Oscar is requesting the loan to provide crop maintenance; he will buy fertilizer, insecticide and pay labor costs for his farm staff.  His main objective is to improve his farm’s productivity because the lack of financing has kept him from providing it with proper maintenance.  With the requested loan, Oscar will be able to improve his coffee farm’s production and thus earn higher income to cover household expenses and provide better quality of life for his family.  He and his wife have worked hard to acquire the family assets because this activity requires very hard work.

One of Oscar’s dreams is to have a more technologically up-to-date farm that would generate resources to provide his family with better quality of life.  He and his fellow coffee growers joined together to form a group with the goal of requesting a loan to improve their farms.  The other group members are Cristino, José and Maximiliano.  Each owns his parcels and has much experience in managing their farms.

Danli, El Paraíso, Honduras-September, 2012

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide and to pay farmworkers' labor costs.

loans.name: Cristhian Reinaldo

texts.es: Cristhian de estado civil casado tiene 2 hijos. Su negocio lo inicio a raíz que se compro su propio vehículo , la cual trabaja de taxi ejecutivo ya que su mayor problema dice Cristhian que es la delincuencia que existe en el país porque tiene miedo a ser asaltado .ya que labora de 8:00am hasta 23:00pm. Con el préstamo comprara: gasolina y reparar el coche etc.
texts.en: Cristhian is married and has two children.  He started his business when he bought his own vehicle.  He works it as an executive taxi and Cristhian says his greatest difficulty is the country’s crime rate because he fears being robbed since he works from 8am until 11pm.  He will use the loan to buy gasoline and repair his car.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, repair the car, etc.

loans.name: Veronica Denis

texts.es:
Verónica tiene 43 años de edad estado civil soltera, tiene 3 hijos Verónica trabajaba en una camaronera pero después una amiga la aconsejo que se ponga un negocio propio, la cual decidió ponerse un negocio en la actualidada ella vende tortilla,ella recorre los barrios de su sector para vender.El sueño de Verónica es tener un local propio a futuro. Con el préstamo ella quiere comprar: verde, queso, harina, gas y una cocina industrial
etc.
texts.en: Verónica, 43, is single and has three children.  Verónica used to work in a shrimp processing plant but a girlfriend advised her to open her own business and she decided to sell tortillas.  She now sells tortillas throughout the neighborhoods in her sector.  Verónica’s dream is to have her own locale in the future.  She wants to use the loan to buy plantain, cheese, flour, gas and and industrial stove, etc.

loans.use: to buy plantains, cheese, flour, gas and an industrial stove.

loans.name: 6 Rosas Group

texts.es: 6 rosas es un grupo integrado por 5 mujeres y decidieron llamarse así porque dicen que son como un botón de rosa que esta abriendo al éxito. La señora Florentina tiene 42 años, es casada, tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 13 años, estudian primaria y secundaria. Florentina es ama de casa y necesitaba mas ingresos para poder cubrir con los gastos de su hogar. Con el crédito pudo iniciar su negocio y ahora lo utilizara para surtir mas pedidos de zapatos de temporada de frío. Ella desea que su negocio crezca y en un futuro poder tener su propia zapatería en su casa. Este grupo a pasado por obstáculos pero al final a salido adelante apoyándose unas a otras.
texts.en: 6 Rosas [6 Roses] is a group of 5 women who decided to name themselves as such because they say they are like a rosebud opening to success. Florentina is 42 years old, married, and has two children, aged 10 and 13, in primary and secondary school. Florentina is a housewife and needed additional income to cover the expenses of her household. With her previous loan she was able to start a business and now she will use this loan to fill more orders of shoes for the winter season. She hopes that her business grows and that in the future she will be able to have her own shoe store in her house. This group has faced obstacles, but in the end they have come out ahead by supporting each other.

loans.use: to fill more orders of shoes for the winter season.

loans.name: Pouwereou De Laouwai Group

texts.fr: Madame sissi est âgée de 42ans. Elle est maman de 04 enfants tous sur les bancs de l’école. L’ainé est âgé de 19ans et le dernier 11ans. Elle est revendeuse de mais en REGION CENTRALE et le fait avec joie car c’est une activité qui lui procure des revenus lui permettant de se prendre en charge et d’assumer les besoins primaires de la famille. Elle sollicite ce second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des mais en abondances et revendre en saison de pénurie. Elle est dans  ce domaine il y a 13ans. Avec les profits, elle veut assurer la scolarité de la famille et devenir une grande commerçante. Les autres femmes sont aussi dans le commerce et espèrent qu’avec ce crédit elles vont assurer un lendemain meilleur à leur famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Sissi, age 42, is the mother of four children aged 11 to 19 who all attend school. She sells maize in the central region, an activity she performs with joy as it allows her to support herself and her children. 

She is seeking a second loan from WAGES to buy a large quantity of maize for resale during periods of shortage. She has been in this line of work for 13 years. 

Mrs. Sissi plans to use her profits to support her children’s education. She wants to become a leading merchant. 

The other group members also work in trade. They hope that this loan will help them to ensure a better future for their families.

loans.use: to buy cereals for resale.

loans.name: Jitahidi Msakuzi Group

texts.en:
Mrisho, who is in his late 30s, is married with two boys who go to school.  For seven years now Mrisho has been running a number of different activities such as selling fish and genge (fruits and vegetables), running a restaurant as well as a general store business. He works from 7am to 10pm daily and he is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be his 13th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to finish building his own house, bought two farms, a sofa set, a TV, solar, bought more traditional hens for producing eggs to resell as well as increased his business inventory. He has paid back all his loans successfully.   He requesting for a new loan which he wants to use to open a cosmetics business.   His dream is to one day be able to expand all his businesses and to be a big businessman.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Jitahidi Msakuzi" which has a total of 13 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: To open a cosmetics business.

loans.name: Bikedinadou Group

texts.fr: Mère  de 04 enfants dont 02 sur les bancs d’école, madame Essossimna née en 1980 est revendeuse de profession. Son conjoint est agriculteur. En 2003, elle a démarré seule son activité. Elle est à son second crédit à WAGES et ce montant lui servira à acheter  du mais. Notons qu’elle est la responsable de groupement « BIKEDINADOU » constitué de femmes qui font tous le commerce. Avec le profit, elles vont agrandir leurs surfaces cultivables et assurer un avenir meilleur à la famille.
texts.en: Mother of four children, two of which attend school, Essossimna was born in 1980 and is a retailer.  Her husband is a farmer. In 2003 she started her business by herself. She is on her second loan with WAGES and this loan will enable her to buy corn.  She is the manager of the Bikedinadou Group which consists of women who are all merchants.  With their profits, they will expand their arable land and ensure a better future for their families.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Ditcheyidadi Group

texts.fr: Mme Clémence est la responsable du groupement nommé DITCHEYIDADI. Elle est âgée de 34ans et est mariée à un cultivateur. Leurs enfants sont au nombre de 03 tous sont sur les bancs d’école. Elle  est revendeuse de profession et est dans cette activité il y a 09ans. Avec ce second crédit qu’elle sollicite de WAGES, elle va acheter du mais pour revendre en saison de pénurie. C’est un groupement constitué de femmes et d’hommes qui sont tous dans le commerce du mais. Comme perspectives d’avenir, les membres veulent rendre leur activité pérenne et voir leur famille s’épanouir.
texts.en: Madam Clémence is the representative of the group named DITCHEYIDADI. She is 34 years old and married to a farmer. Their children number 3 and all go to school. She is a reseller by profession and has been in this business for 9 years. With this second loan that she is requesting from WAGES, she is going to buy corn to resell during the season where there are shortages. This is a group consisting of men and women who all sell corn. For future perspectives, the members want to make their business sustainable and to see their families flourish.

loans.use: to buy cereal.
